amendatorysection.catchline: Organ and tissue donations; immunity from criminal liability.
amendatorysection.para: A coroner, a coroner's designee, a coroner's physician or his or her designee, a facility at which an organ or tissue recovery took place pursuant to sections 23-1825 to 23-1832, any authorized recovery personnel, or any other person who acts in good faith in compliance with sections 23-1825 to 23-1832 shall be immune from criminal liability for recovery of any organ or tissue.
